column4: does any one know how to change the "ubuntu loading" screen. The screen in between bios (or grub if you have it) and the login screen, and the screen in between desktop and shut off?
the one with name ubuntu and four dots under it?
there is one ap called ubuntu tweak try it see if it does this
where do i find ubuntu tweak?
i ain't clickin on no tinyurl
I found it already, i appreciate your advice, we'll see what happens
yes and it dont have setting for splash screen i checked it after i told you!!! :P
i gave you another url above? have you seen it?
it has login settings but they are greyed out...
loging setting are not for splash screen. you have to click on a unlock button on bottom right side to unlock it
i understand that. but i want to tweak the whole startup sequence, and i like the gui of ubuntu tweak, so i'm going to play with it for a while
